expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure (src/api, src/workers, src/shared)
expectations.evidence: Codebase Structure section with tree diagram

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Build and Run, Testing, Linting sections with commands

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies: TypeScript, Express, Prisma, Redis, BullMQ
expectations.evidence: Project Overview paragraph lists all five

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Build and Run section includes db:migrate, db:seed, db:studio

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
Commands are formatted as bullet list items (e.g., '- Run `cmd` to do X') rather than headings with code blocks
expectations.evidence: Uses ```bash code blocks, not bullet lists
